plot: A young married couple's relationship becomes strained when he is assigned overseas as a foreign correspondent and she becomes a major stage star.
title: Cuando volvamos a amarnos
plot_es: A young married couple's relationship becomes strained when he is assigned overseas as a foreign correspondent and she becomes a major stage star.
plot_en: A young married couple's relationship becomes strained when he is assigned overseas as a foreign correspondent and she becomes a major stage star.
